Package com.avrix.ui.widgets

Class LabelWidget

java.lang.Object
com.avrix.ui.widgets.Widget
com.avrix.ui.widgets.LabelWidget
public class LabelWidget extends Widget
A Widget for displaying text labels with customizable font and color.

  • Field Summary
